snippet.title: Lets Play Broken Sword 2.5 - The Return of the Templars
snippet.description: Perhaps it's me, but the fan voice actor for George sounds bored. While I understand their legal reasoning, Rolf Saxon should've voiced George, the fan actor guy just didn't even bother to try to imitate Saxon. Also, he couldn't pronounce Zinedine Zidane's name correctly, it bugs me when a character will pronounce a name one way, then another would pronounce it another. CONSISTENCY PEOPLE! It's even more annoying with they pronounce a real persons name wrong as well.
